he wanted to sayto his fellow animals

And at last everyonecould be settled

My dear friends,I have lived
a long live.

text:
I have had much timefor thought as I lay
alone in my stall.

text:
I won't be with you much longer.And before I die, there is something

text:
Few of us will ever knowthe blessings
of a peaceful old age.

text: You Boxer, when you have giventhe last of your great strength.

text: What then?

text:
Whatever we produce,is taken from us.
Stolen from us. And sold.

text: Our children are bornto cold and hunger.

text: Look at them while you can.

text:
You porkers.You know what the future
holds for you?

text: Do we deserve such a fate?

text: No comrades.When the farm is rich,

we would never getour rightful share

title: Animal Farm

when you havegot rid of Johns.

fur or feathers,

the animalsfound their situation

Comrades.Our first five month plan

text: and the time has cometo spread the glorious news.

So that ourdowntrodden comrades

will break their chainsand join the

any change.
